question_text: Why is URL filtering considered an important layer in a defense-in-depth strategy?
answer_options: It performs automated patching for the OS
It eliminates the need for antivirus software
It prevents users from accessing known malicious or high-risk sites
It disables unused network ports on the switch
correct_answer: It prevents users from accessing known malicious or high-risk sites
explanation: URL filtering stops users from visiting domains associated with malware or phishing, reducing exposure even before payloads are delivered.
